abstract: There have been plenty of comments on Vice Chancellor John W. Noble’s decision in Ryan v. Lyondell, and his subsequent opinion refusing to allow the defendants’ an interlocutory appeal from that decision, and they will no doubt be fodder for many a law review article. The decision is a bombshell and will likely result in more procedure for boards considering a sale of their company.
lead_paragraph: There have been plenty of comments on Vice Chancellor John W. Noble’s decision in Ryan v. Lyondell, and his subsequent opinion refusing to allow the defendants’ an interlocutory appeal from that decision, and they will no doubt be fodder for many a law review article. The decision is a bombshell and will likely result in more procedure for boards considering a sale of their company.

headline.main: Strine Speaks as Delaware Decision Makes Waves
